item.title: 观察：中国在线零售商公布第四季度营收高于预期，并宣布将扩大股票回购计划规模，股价在美股盘前交易中大涨 12
item.description:
WATCH: https://t.co/LOi8NHnjTY shares jumped 12% in US premarket trading after the Chinese online retailer reported fourth-quarter revenue above estimates and announced it would increase the size of its share repurchase program https://t.co/VFbDzWwWbG pic.twitter.com/Gyk4lhB2H3

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 观看：DHL表示，全球贸易反弹的迹象尚不明显。这家德国快递巨头预计今年的税前盈利将达到 72 亿美元，高于疫情前的水平，但最多与分析师的预期持平。
item.description:
WATCH: DHL says there’s little sign, yet, of a global trade rebound. The German delivery giant expects pre-tax earnings of up to $7.2 billion for this year, above pre-pandemic levels but at best matching analyst estimates https://t.co/rzfbAhh2VO pic.twitter.com/MzdlTMPBkr

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 观看：ChatGPT制造商OpenAI驳斥了埃隆-马斯克的说法，即这家初创公司放弃了开发人工智能的初衷，即造福人类而非牟利。
item.description:
WATCH: ChatGPT maker OpenAI refuted Elon Musk's claims that the startup abandoned its original mission to develop artificial intelligence for the benefit of humanity and not for profit https://t.co/twJNumlHEu pic.twitter.com/u6m5HNbZzV

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 来自@Breakingviews：@mak_robyn 谈泰国要摆脱经济萎靡不振的局面，不能仅仅依靠泰勒-斯威夫特的演唱会来提振经济。
item.description:

item.title: 观看：德国物流巨头DHL集团周三预测，其2024年的营业利润将高于疫情前的数字，但由于全球贸易疲软，该公司的前景没有达到市场共识。
item.description:
WATCH: German logistics giant DHL Group on Wednesday forecast its 2024 operating profit to come in above pre-pandemic figures, but the outlook fell short of market consensus amid weaker global trade https://t.co/rzfbAhh2VO pic.twitter.com/d7ESL9G4OV

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 观看：塔吉特公布的假日季度财报显示，销售额降幅小于预期，全年可比销售额将大幅高于华尔街预期，股价因此上涨 12
item.description:

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 看在埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）上周对其联合创办的初创公司提起诉讼，指控该公司违约后，聊天软件制造商 OpenAI 表示打算驳回埃隆-马斯克的所有诉讼请求，并称这家由微软支持的公司现在正专注于赚钱。
item.description:
WATCH: ChatGPT maker OpenAI said it intends to move to dismiss all of Elon Musk's claims after he filed a lawsuit against the startup he co-founded last week, alleging breach of contract, saying the Microsoft-backed firm is now focused on making money https://t.co/twJNummfu2 pic.twitter.com/i49KrrjHeo

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 三位知情人士透露，私募股权公司凯雷投资集团（Carlyle Group）已开始出售日本化妆品供应商 Tokiwa，交易价值可能达到 8 亿美元。
item.description:
Private equity firm Carlyle Group has begun the sale process of Japanese cosmetics supplier Tokiwa in a deal that could value the company at $800 million, three sources with knowledge of the matter said https://t.co/GCCHEUKyU7

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024
